text.event: You pick up a small bone wrapped in green cloth. Upon closer inspection, it turns out to be a useful trinket. Give it to one stack of your troops.
text.name: Lesser Powerbone

text.event: You pick up a bone wrapped in red cloth. Upon closer inspection, it turns out to be a useful trinket. Give it to one stack of your troops.
text.name: Greater Powerbone

text.event: You pick up a large bone wrapped in ornamental purple cloth. Upon closer inspection, it turns out to be a useful trinket. Give it to one stack of your troops.
text.name: Hallowed Powerbone
